title: Ticket #7642: for ALL NonNegotiatedSessions make sure the version info is propagated
description:
We recently added propagation of version info from Execute node to Submit node. There are other places where we create non-negotiated sessions, for example:
  • Parent/Child
  • SchedD/Negotiator
  • gridmanager/ft-gahp

Currently, none of these are "important" because either the version information is propagated through another means, is inferred due to daemon locality, or is not needed. However, I created this ticket to do a few things:

  • Double check the existing locations to make sure the above assumptions of being "not important" are true.
  • See if there are any other locations in the code that use NonNegotiatedSessions
  • Add the info anyway so in the future the version info is available if/when we need it
  • See if there is a better way to enforce that the version info is always present (e.g. by enforcing that the ShortVersion always be part of the imported classad for NonNegSess, or is a required parameter to the functions, etc.)
creator: zmiller
